summary:
I'm a loyal employee who takes pride and ownership of my responsibilities. Therefore I assure work is carried out timely, safe and cost effective, in accordance with procedures and company goals. I also have the ability to stimulate creative and fit for purpose solutions when required and fully understands how decisions are impacting projects and future business down the line. I also enjoy coaching my colleagues to ensure they deliver to their full potential. 

Due to my general business interest, I have an overall knowledge of all kinds of industries such as IT and Marine. Because of my offshore master (cum laude) and civil bachelor degree, I have a complete understanding of the Energy, Civil, and in particular the Offshore industry market. Due to my work experience, I have got an in-depth knowledge of floating oil and gas systems, Brown Field Engineering, Biogas Upgrading facilities, and EPCI (Engineering, Procurement, Construction, Installation) projects.    

I'm interested in management functions, project management and business development.

education.field_of_study: Offshore Engineering - Majors: Floating Structures, Subsea Engineering and dredging Engineering

publications.name: ADvanced Weathervaning in ICE (ADWICE)
publications.publisher: OMEA2011 June 2011, Rotterdam, The Netherlands. SBM Offshore

authors.headline: Concept / R&D Engineer, Floating offshore wind, SBM Offshore

courses.name: DVN: Introduction to Quantitative Risk Assessment Course
Falck Nutec: BST and HUET with Emergency Breathing System
IDC Technologies: Fundamentals of Process Plant Layout and Piping design
Krauthammer: SBM Management Development Program. 3 sessions of 2 days within 3 months, focused on soft skills.
Multi Media: Microsoft Project Training Course

Oxford Group & Nyaly consultants - SBM Project Management training program - 4 Modules, each 2 days, [1] Project management essentials, [2] Planning Control & reporting, [3] project leadership and communication, [4] contractual and financial management

SBM in-house training sessions: Fire water systems, Gas turbines, Gas compression & treatment systems, Separation System Design & operation, Process Safety Management, EX equipment selection & Installation, ON/OFF valves, Vessel tanker conversion
SBM in-house training sessions: Pump Fundamentals; Marine Systems, Topsides Structural Design; FPSO Fire water system, Flare system design and Gas turbines

profile_positions.description:
Leading teams responsible for proposal and lifecycle management, reporting to the CEO.

Proposals – Leading a team with employees in Portland USA and Joure, to deliver proposals for sustainable biogas upgrading facilities varying from around 1 to 10 Millon Euro / Usd. For all proposals, the technical solutions are  pre-designed and the expected costs including profits are provided.

Standardization -  Acting as Project Manager,  reporting to a steering committee chaired by the CEO, with a multi-disciplinary team, responsible for the design of new standards for biogas upgrading facilities. The standards result primarily into more commercially attractive facilities, less manhours for execution, reduced delivery time, consistent quality and the ability to generate more service margins in the future.

Life Cycle Management – In consultation with key stakeholders, implemented a continuous improvement process, to assess and execute suggested modifications for the standardized systems.
profile_positions.title: Manager Global Technology Support

profile_positions.description:
Reporting to the CEO, executed and implemented improvement projects (mainly business processes) for the business units Joure and Portland USA. As a result, frequently travelled and stayed for a few weeks in Portland. A typical example below: 

POAM –  The Pre Order Acceptance Meeting ensures that all new projects are properly assessed to ensure profitable succesfull execution. A thorough complete risk assessment is performed, including a risk management strategy. In addition, prior to the final contracting signatures, a project scope summary including all key financial figures are provided to the board for final approval.
profile_positions.title: Business Consultant

profile_positions.description:
Department restructuring - Together with the management team, successfully restructured the operations department into an engineering, project management and services department, to be able to meet the ambitious objectives of DMT for the following years. 

As manager engineering, implemented within the engineering department essential organisational modifications, to be able to operate in a more structured manor. According to a new appraisal system, ranked all engineers and carried out the re-occurring appraisal system meetings.

Recruiting new Manager Engineering – As per initial objective set from the start, together with an external recruitment partner, recruited a new manager engineering and supported him at the start.
profile_positions.title: Manager Engineering

profile_positions.description:
Past Projects:

1] Part of F4W team to optimize and standardize FPSOs, focusing on the topsides (Oil and gas processing facilities on top of the vessel). Responsible of delivering the design of three oil processing modules, two power generation modules, and four manifold modules weighing a total of 8,500 metric tons. F4W became and is still a huge success for SBM offshore.

2] FPSO Topsides Engineering Project Manager, for a new FPSO, to be located offshore Angola. Joined the team within the last 4 months to further optimise the FEED design and finalise the updated proposal. The topsides facility consists of 17 modules, weighing a total of 14,500 metric tons. The main technical challenges are the high Gas to Oil ratio, the local content, and the stringent client requirements. 

3] Part of Pre-FEED proposal engineering team, for a new FPSO in the Gulf of Mexico. The topsides facility consists of 10 modules, weighing a total of 8,250 metric tons. The main technical challenges are the heavy crude, high H2S and salt contents and the very low hydrocarbon gas content.
profile_positions.title: Topsides Engineering Project Manager / Project Engineer

profile_positions.description:
Member of After Sales Department created in Kuala Lumpur, responsible for proposals and the full execution of small to major size brown field projects.

Main projects: 

1] As overall EPM, managed an engineering team , to design a major upgrade for FPSO Aseng, operating in Equatorial Guinea, to connect a water injection, gas injection and hydrocarbon riser for the Diega field. 

FPSO modifications comprised of installing a new 800 tons module by a heavy lift vessel, upgrading the accommodation block, adding 2 new lifeboats including a deck extension, upgrading the relief system, pipe rack tie-ins to integrate the new module with the facility, compressor upgrades to increase the flow capacity and turret changes to be able to connect the 3 new risers. 

2] Managed a project team to upgrade the lifeboats to increase the maximum crew capacity onboard FPSO KIKEH, by destructing two existing lifeboats, reinforcing and extending the deck, and installing two 105 persons lifeboats. 

3] Project engineer for installing an offshore module, which removes the sand at the bottom of production separators, combines all oil slurry lines and removes the oil from the slurry.
profile_positions.title: Engineering Project Manager & Project Engineer

profile_positions.description:
As section lead, established successfully procedures in KL, to prepare proposals and providing engineering assistance, for small to medium sized brown field projects at SBM FLEET ( FPSO Kikeh, Aseng, BC10 and FSO Yetagun).

On a yearly basis around 80 FLEET projects requests were handled.  Daily work mostly involved preparing proposals and managing an engineering team who were working on various projects simultaneously. 

Examples of medium size projects: 

1] Design a chemical injection skid and modifications of the production swivels, to protect the FPSO KIKEH swivel seals against production fluids sand intrusion.

2] Design modifications of the blowdown and relief safety systems, to update FPSO Kikeh as per latest company and international standards. Work involved an extensive process study, major piping modifications and structural modifications.
profile_positions.title: Section Lead Kuala Lumpur - Fleet Engineering Support Group

profile_positions.description:
Member of department to ensure safe, efficient, high quality brown field engineering for modifications on SBM producing FLEET. 

On a yearly basis each project engineer handled around 20 FLEET projects requests. Daily work mostly involved providing input for proposals and managing engineering teams. 

Projects that stood out: 

1] Managed an engineering team and third parties, to investigate the reasoning of a FPSO mooring line failure, respond to insurance queries and reconnect the mooring line.

2] Deputy EPM, responsible for the design of pipe sections and the chemical injection system to accommodate additional riser and umbilical pull ins, install variance frequency drives to feed new subsea equipment, and a Water Injection Sulphate removal module.
profile_positions.title: Project Engineer

profile_positions.description: Developed a new ice dynamic mechanic model, for ice sheets drifting towards sloping structures, used as a basis for programming a new software, which was coupled with ANSYS- AQWA. The software was successfully calibrated against ice model weathervaning tests in Hamburg, to calculate the weathervaning mooring loads and vessel rotation of a FPSO in ice sheets.
profile_positions.title: Graduation Student

profile_positions.description: Study to build an as build weight database of completed FPSO projects, and to determine relationships between weight categories of the topsides.
profile_positions.title: Internship

profile_positions.description:
Part time student job during my masters Oil & Gas Engineering TU Delft.

Acted as a project engineer to design, fabricate and install a system that provides an objective decision if it is safe to transfer an offshore crew member from a transport vessel to offshore Shell platforms in Brunei.

Assisted with some general activities to fabricate the 2nd Ampelmann system.

Supervised the offloading of an Ampelmann platform in Trinidad & Tobago and in the port of Rotterdam.
profile_positions.title: Junior Engineer
